Text:
Hey tta64!
Just wanted to express my EXTREME gratitude....I have been looking for this for a while!
Haha holy crap i just looked at the date...realized you just uploaded it...
anyways, good on you, and thanks so much for this download. 
Also, could you upload the last book in the Morningstar Saga by Z.A. Recht? I can't find it anywhere on the interwebz. :/
Thanks again!

hey ironjoker!
thx for the support!

you asked, and I answered thru the interwebz:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7616449/Morningstar_Saga_by_Z.A._Recht_in_.epub_Format

your welcome ;)
Any chance you have recent (May 2012) to current Star Wars and Star Trek books?  All the collections on TPB are somewhat dated...
hmm, what do you mean? like are they a comic books series or a rewrite or what exactly? I'm confused to as what to look for....

First off, thanks for uploading this series, I've been trying to find it since my classmate lent me the first book to start off. Could I ask if you could upload the Secrets of the Immortal Nicholas Flamel series when you get the chance? Thx a bunch! :D

hey schmoopduck - nice name btw,

I got the series for you, and as a bonus I found two short stories as well (one after book 4 and the other after book 5). Your welcome :D

Enjoy!

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7647178/Secrets_of_the_Immortal_by_Nicholas_Flamel_in_.epub
*correction everybody, book 12 is never gonna b made, instead john flanagan is writing another series entirely, from the Skandian POV. I'll upload it if I can get my hands on it....
OMG! I have been looking for this everywhere! Also, I agree with schmoopduck, Can you upload Secrets of the Immortal Nicholas Flamel? Thanks a bunch!
Sorry Just realized you had already uploaded it. Thanks. I will definitely seed both this download and the nichflam one for ages for you and others!
thanks moe, glad I have your support
